text: “Ezɨ atrivim, nɨ akar kɨ mɨgeim gifueghɨva, nɨ akam gumazamiziba bagh anemadagh kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, ‘Vasti ua izɨ Atrivim Serksisɨn ganan kogham.’ Nɨ akɨnafarir Persia ko Midian araziba aven itim, nɨ a inigh arazir kam osirigh. Eghtɨ arazir kam ikɨ kamaghɨra ikiam. Egh nɨ amizir aghuir igharazitam inightɨ, a Kwin Vastin danganim inigh kwinɨn ikɨ.
